_comment: Configuration file for lending analysis business rules. Modify this file to update rules without changing code.

_instructions.debt_collectors: Companies that purchase debts - accounts from these are out of scope
_instructions.subprime_lenders: High-risk lenders that target customers with poor credit
_instructions.telecom_companies: Telecommunications providers - not subject to lending claims
_instructions.insolvent_companies: Companies no longer in business - cannot pursue claims
_instructions.non_credit_account_types: Account types that don't involve lending decisions
_instructions.repair_lending_patterns: Keywords that identify repair lending (secured, not risky)
